E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 2/5/1987
Subject: Contract offer
Please increase the number of years in your
offer. 3 years is definitely not enough!

Regards,
Chet Lemon



Date: Friday, 2/7/1987
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, California has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Chet Lemon



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of German Rivera
Dear Sir,
German Rivera has nothing more to prove at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an AVG of .393 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
